text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/23c55273739b2fb09912140e2e03a4b8ff15dd04|patch 8.2.1029: Vim9: cannot chain function calls with -> at line start>
patch 8.2.1029: Vim9: cannot chain function calls with -> at line start

Problem:    Vim9: cannot chain function calls with -> at line start.
Solution:   Peek ahead for a following line starting with "->". (closes #6306)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1029: Vim9: cannot chain function calls with -> at line start · vim/vim@23c5527
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1029: Vim9: cannot chain function calls with -> at line start · vim/vim@23c5527
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: cannot chain function calls with -> at line start. Solution: Peek ahead for a following line starting with "->". (closes #6306)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/da58134eedf43ae4b9013c93ecbdf55e4da4b8a3|patch 8.2.1030: reducing size of a terminal window may cause a crash>
patch 8.2.1030: reducing size of a terminal window may cause a crash

Problem:    Reducing size of a terminal window may cause a crash.
Solution:   Make sure the row and column don't become negative. (closes #6273)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1030: reducing size of a terminal window may cause a crash · vim/vim@da58134
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1030: reducing size of a terminal window may cause a crash · vim/vim@da58134
attachments.text: Problem: Reducing size of a terminal window may cause a crash. Solution: Make sure the row and column don't become negative. (closes #6273)

patch 8.2.1031: build failure with Perl5.32

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/7fe875583bb474d03d281ca59af3320e7e176953|patch 8.2.1032: error message for declaring a variable cannot be tran…>
patch 8.2.1032: error message for declaring a variable cannot be translated

Problem:    Error message for declaring a variable cannot be translated.
Solution:   Enclose in _().  Make environment variable a separate message.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1032: error message for declaring a variable cannot be tran… · vim/vim@7fe8755
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1032: error message for declaring a variable cannot be tran… · vim/vim@7fe8755
attachments.text: …slated Problem: Error message for declaring a variable cannot be translated. Solution: Enclose in _(). Make environment variable a separate message.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/8d9437968b6693ecb14e7375bcb242e657e75266|patch 8.2.1033: not easy to read the test time in the test output>
patch 8.2.1033: not easy to read the test time in the test output

Problem:    Not easy to read the test time in the test output.
Solution:   Align the times.  Make slow tests bold.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1033: not easy to read the test time in the test output · vim/vim@8d94379
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1033: not easy to read the test time in the test output · vim/vim@8d94379
attachments.text: Problem: Not easy to read the test time in the test output. Solution: Align the times. Make slow tests bold.

patch 8.2.1034: compiler warning for uninitialized variables

Solution:   Add initializations. (John Marriott)
